info.title: e-Disaster API
info.description: Disaster Management System API for Mobile Applications

post.description: Authenticate user and return access token

message.example: Account is not active. Please contact administrator.

post.description: Register a new volunteer user (requires admin approval)

message.example: Registration successful. Please wait for admin approval.

post.description: Logout user and invalidate access token

get.description: Get authenticated user's profile information including profile picture

422.description: Validation failed or incorrect current password

post.description: Upload or update user's profile picture

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for name or description

Get all images associated with a specific model

message.example: Invalid model type. Must be one of: disaster, disaster_report, disaster_victim, disaster_aid

post.description: Upload image for a specific model (disaster, disaster_report, disaster_victim, disaster_aid)

get.description: Get details of a specific image

message.example: Invalid model type. Must be one of: disaster, disaster_report, disaster_victim, disaster_aid

put.description: Update metadata for a specific image

message.example: Invalid model type. Must be one of: disaster, disaster_report, disaster_victim, disaster_aid

delete.description: Delete a specific image and its file from storage

message.example: Invalid model type. Must be one of: disaster, disaster_report, disaster_victim, disaster_aid
